9301G0080-d-01-30-93-SOO.Narrative: BENSENVILL YD ASSIGNMENT 1300, WITH 2 UNITS, 11 LOADS, 19 EMPTIES & 1750 TONS WHILE TRAVELING WEST AT 2 MPH ON THE LOW SIDE HUMP DERAILING 3CARS DUE TO LATERAL DRAWBAR FORCE OF EMPTY CAR ON CURVE AGAINST BLOCK OF 8 HEAVY LOADS SITTING ON INCLINE TO HUMP. HUMP ASSIGNMENT DOUBLED TRACK 19C TO 7C AND PULLED W OUT OF W YARD TRACK 24 IN ORDER TO MAKE AN EASTWARD MOVE TO THE HUMP LEAD. AFTER CONVERSATION WITH THE YDMSTR, THE CREW WAS DIRECTED TO USE THE ALTERNATE ROUTE OF WEST YD 24 TO THE LOW SIDE, THEN THE LOW SIDE TO THE HUMP LEAD. THIS ROUTE ENCOMPASSED THREE CURVES TO REACH THE CREST OF THE HILL. ASSIGNMENT 1300 WAS HUMPING CARS WITH 30 REMAINING WHEN THE 22ND, 23RD AND WEST CAR OF 8 HEAVYLOADS SITTING ON THE INCLINE TO THE HUMP INCURRED EXCESSIVE LATERAL DRAWBAR FORCE ON THE CURVE FROM WEST YD 24 TO THE LOW SIDE. THE 22ND CARJTTX 940933 FROM THE ENGINE AND JTTX 940918, 21ST CAR FROM THEENGINE DERAILED AS THE ENGINE SHOVED E. AS THEN. RAIL OF THE HUMP LEAD TURNED OUT, THE R3 &R4 WHEELSOF THE W. TRUCK OF EJE 5716 ALSO DERAILED. VIEW OF THE DERAILMENT WAS OBSCURED FROM BOTH ENGR & GROUND CREW DUE TO CIRCUITOUS ROUTE OF W. YD 24/LOW SIDE/HUMP LEAD. EJE 5716 WAS UPRIGHTNoneNoneNone
